DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to characterize the inflammatory proteins, gene polymorphisms, and transcriptome profiles in patients with chronic atrophic dermatitis to gain better insight into pathogenesis of chronic infection with Borrelia burgdorferi sensu lato.
DOC.brief_title: Laboratory Characteristics in Chronic Atrophic Acrodermatitis
DOC.criteria: chronic atrophic dermatitis in patients >18 years
